Package com.hannesdorfmann.mosby3.mvp.lce

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MvpLceView<M>
    A MvpView that assumes that there are 3 display operation: MvpLceView.showLoading(boolean): Display a loading animation while loading data in background by invoking the corresponding presenter method MvpLceView.showError(Throwable, boolean): Display a error view (a TextView) on the screen if an error has occurred while loading data.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    LceAnimator
    Little helper class for animating content, error and loading view
    MvpLceActivity<CV extends View,M,V extends MvpLceView<M>,P extends MvpPresenter<V>>
    A MvpActivity that implements MvpLceView which gives you 3 options: Display a loading view: A view with R.id.loadingView must be specified in your inflated xml layout Display a error view: A TextView with R.id.errorView must be declared in your inflated xml layout Display content view: A view with R.id.contentView must be specified in your inflated xml layout
    MvpLceFragment<CV extends View,M,V extends MvpLceView<M>,P extends MvpPresenter<V>>
    A MvpFragment that implements MvpLceView which gives you 3 options: Display a loading view: A view with R.id.loadingView must be specified in your inflated xml layout Display a error view: A TextView with R.id.errorView must be declared in your inflated xml layout Display content view: A view with R.id.contentView must be specified in your inflated xml layout
